EmailTemplate.subject: Elevated Remodeling - Interview Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Candidate__c.First_Name__c},
Thank you for applying to Elevated Remodeling, Your phone call for the {!Candidate__c.Applied_For__c} Department stood out to us and I would like to invite you for an interview to get to know you a bit better.
Location: 285 N Broadway Pennsville, NJ 08070 United States
You will meet with the manager of the {!Candidate__c.Applied_For__c} Department. The interview can last up to 45 minutes and you will have the chance to discuss the {!Candidate__c.Applied_For__c} position and learn more about the company. Please dress professionally (business professional), bring two copies of your resume and something to write with.
Your interview is {!Interview__c.Interview_Date_Time__c}. Look forward to meeting with you,
Sarina Britton Elevated Remodeling W: (609) 613-4041
